data.title: Allentown, Pennsylvania Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Allentown, Pennsylvania with information about Allentown, Pennsylvania official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Allentown, Pennsylvania is officially in the Eastern Time Zone

The Current Time in

Allentown, Pennsylvania is:

Sunday

8/18/2024

5:57 AM

EDT

Allentown, Pennsylvania

is in the

Eastern Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Eastern Standard Time - is abbreviated as EST

Eastern Daylight Time - is abbreviated as EDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Allentown, Pennsylvania is GMT/UTC - 5h during Standard Time

Allentown, Pennsylvania is GMT/UTC - 4h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Allentown, Pennsylvania starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
